channel.title: Jetstream on mgalalm - blog
channel.description: Recent content in Jetstream on mgalalm - blog

item.title: How to Enable Profile Photos in Jetstream
item.description: Avatar is a great way to personalize your application! They make user profiles more engaging and ensure everyone has a recognizable avatar when creating or commenting on posts. If you’re using Jetstream and want to enable custom profile photos, here’s a simple guide to get you started.

item.title: Demystifying Laravel Jetstream
item.description: Laravel Jetstream is a polished UI scaffolding package for Laravel applications. It provides developers with a refined starting point for building user interfaces, offering pre-built components and workflows for common features like authentication, profile management, and two-factor authentication.
